description: Has all features needed, easy to use, performant and Open Source, what you would expect.
summary: Great app for learning to type with ten fingers, great experience

description:
It gives you lots of information about your progress and is very intuitive.
there are different courses which get harder with time

For anyone looking to boost their typing speed and accuracy, I can highly recommend TIPP10. It's been a fantastic tool for me, blending efficiency with user-friendliness. The progress tracking is detailed and motivating, making the learning curve not just manageable but genuinely enjoyable. A well-deserved 5 stars from me!
